titles.title: A bill to amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to protect the cultural practices and livelihoods of producers of Alaska Native handicrafts and fossilized ivory products, and for other purposes.
Empowering Rural Economies Through Alaska Native Sustainable Arts and Handicrafts Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
